description.p:
With Php 4.2 and 5 you can get full access to XmlBlaster's interface, with synchronous and asynchronous calls.
At the moment there is only demo with Php as a web script engine using XmlRpc.
You can have a look at the README file here.
The demo is in xmlBlaster/demo/php and looking like a simple app for querying and publishing.
